General.Name: Bridge SaaS Ltd.
General.Description: Bridge SaaS Limited provides Software-as-a-Service based customer relationship management software and workflow solutions to the employment, care, and support industries in Australia. The company offers software products for customer relationship management, communications management, client case management, scheduling, forms and assessments, and document management. Its software helps third party providers of government funded programs manage their day-to-day operations in administering some federal government funded programs. The company was formerly known as JN Solutions Australia Pty Ltd. Bridge SaaS Limited was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Sydney, Australia.
